languages.text: "Я не поддерживаю методы ксеносов, но понимаю их мотивы. Быть может, им стоит просто выплатить компенсацию?"

traits.locale_text: "Я не поддерживаю методы ксеносов, но понимаю их мотивы. Быть может, им стоит просто выплатить компенсацию?"

languages.text: "I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"
languages.original_text: "Я не поддерживаю методы ксеносов, но понимаю их мотивы. Быть может, им стоит просто выплатить компенсацию?"

traits.locale_text: "I do not support the xenos's methods but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you a compensation?"
"I do not support the xenos's methods but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you a compensation?"
"I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"
"I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"
"I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"
"I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"

languages.text: «No apruebo los métodos de los xenos, pero entiendo sus motivos. ¿Y si le pagaran algún tipo de compensación?».
languages.original_text: "I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"

traits.locale_text: «No apruebo los métodos de los xenos, pero entiendo sus motivos. ¿Y si le pagaran algún tipo de compensación?».

languages.text: “我不支持这些异形的做法，但我能理解他们的动机。或许他们可以给你些赔偿？”
languages.original_text: "I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"

traits.locale_text: “我不支持这些异形的做法，但我能理解他们的动机。或许他们可以给你些赔偿？”

languages.text: « Je ne cautionne pas les méthodes des xénos, mais je comprends leurs raisons. Peut-être pourraient-ils vous verser une compensation ? »
languages.original_text: "I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne cautionne pas les méthodes des xénos, mais je comprends leurs raisons. Peut-être pourraient-ils vous verser une compensation ? »

languages.text: 「私は異種族のやり方を支持しないが、彼らの動機は理解できる。彼らは、お前に補償金を支払うことができるのではないか？」
languages.original_text: "I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は異種族のやり方を支持しないが、彼らの動機は理解できる。彼らは、お前に補償金を支払うことができるのではないか？」

languages.text: "Ich unterstütze die Methoden der Xenos nicht, aber ich verstehe ihre Motive. Vielleicht könnten sie Euch eine Entschädigung bezahlen?"
languages.original_text: "I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich unterstütze die Methoden der Xenos nicht, aber ich verstehe ihre Motive. Vielleicht könnten sie Euch eine Entschädigung bezahlen?"

languages.text: "Zenoların yöntemlerini desteklemiyorum ama güdülerini anlayabiliyorum. Belki sana telafi ödemesi yapabilirler, ne dersin?"
languages.original_text: "I do not support the methods of the xenos, but I understand their motives. Perhaps they could pay you compensation?"

traits.locale_text: "Zenoların yöntemlerini desteklemiyorum ama güdülerini anlayabiliyorum. Belki sana telafi ödemesi yapabilirler, ne dersin?"
